Securities, strategic advisory, and other investment banking activities are performed globally by investment banking affiliates of Bank of America Corporation (\"Investment Banking Affiliates\"), including, in the United States, Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith Incorporated, which is a registered broker-dealer and member of FINRA and SIPC, and, in other jurisdictions, locally registered entities.
